title: Week Review: Place Structure Mastery
goal: Demonstrate complete mastery of place structures, conversions, and tags.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Quick recall:

se swaps → ?     fa marks → ?
te swaps → ?     fe marks → ?
ve swaps → ?     fi marks → ?
xe swaps → ?     fo marks → ?
                 fu marks → ?

(Answers: x1↔x2, x1↔x3, x1↔x4, x1↔x5 | x1, x2, x3, x4, x5)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

What You Reviewed This Week

1. Conversions

Cmavo Swaps
se x1↔x2
te x1↔x3
ve x1↔x4
xe x1↔x5

2. Place Tags

Tag Marks
fa x1
fe x2
fi x3
fo x4
fu x5

3. Week 9 Gismu (8)

Lojban English
bilga obligated
curmi allow
sarcu necessary
pacna hope
terpa fear
tatpi tired
xagji hungry
taske thirsty

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate to English:

  1. bilga →
  2. terpa →
  3. xagji →
  4. pacna →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. allow →
  2. necessary →
  3. tired →
  4. thirsty →
Answers
  1. obligated
  2. fear
  3. hungry
  4. hope
  5. curmi
  6. sarcu
  7. tatpi
  8. taske

Part B: Conversions (8 points)

Apply the conversion:

  1. mi prami do with se → ?
  2. mi dunda la cukta la .bob. with te → ?
  3. mi vecnu la karce do pa no no with ve → ?
  4. mi klama la .paris. zo'e zo'e la karce with xe → ?

Identify what x1 becomes:

  1. se dunda → x1 = ?
  2. te benji → x1 = ?
  3. ve vecnu → x1 = ?
  4. xe klama → x1 = ?
Answers
  1. do se prami mi
  2. la .bob. te dunda la cukta mi
  3. pa no no ve vecnu la karce do mi
  4. la karce xe klama la .paris. zo'e zo'e mi
  5. gift
  6. destination (receiver)
  7. price
  8. vehicle

Part C: Place Tags (9 points)

Rewrite with explicit tags:

  1. mi dunda la cukta la .alis. → ?
  2. do klama la .paris. la .london. → ?

Rewrite with recipient first (using tags):

  1. mi dunda la cukta la .bob. → ?

Decode (identify x1, x2, x3):

  1. fi la .tam. fa mi cu benji fe la notci x1=?, x2=?, x3=?

Express the same idea with conversion instead of tags:

  1. fi la .bob. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta → ? (use te)
Answers
  1. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta fi la .alis.
  2. fa do cu klama fe la .paris. fi la .london.
  3. fi la .bob. fa mi cu dunda fe la cukta
  4. x1=mi, x2=la notci, x3=la .tam. (I send a message to Tom)
  5. la .bob. te dunda la cukta mi

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Create a Complex Narrative

Use at least:

  • One se conversion
  • One te conversion
  • One place tag construction
  • Two of this week's gismu

Example:

mi tatpi .i mi xagji la plise
.i la plise se vecnu la prenu mi
.i la .bob. te dunda la plise mi
.i mi gleki

(I am tired. I am hungry for apples. Apples are sold by a person to me. Bob receives apples from me. I am happy.)

Create your own and say it aloud.

Summary

You completed Week 9, the comprehensive place structure review. You've mastered conversions (se/te/ve/xe), place tags (fa-fu), and can translate between systems.

Next week preview: Week 10 introduces tanru — two-word compounds where the left word modifies the right.

Congratulations

do kakne lo nu pilno la .lojban. le pluja

(You are able to use Lojban in complex ways!)

Nine weeks complete. You've mastered Lojban's place structure system.
